title: Stock and market index prediction using Informer network. (arXiv:2305.14382v1 [q-fin.ST])
abstract: Applications of deep learning in financial market prediction has attracted huge attention from investors and researchers. In particular, intra-day prediction at the minute scale, the dramatically fluctuating volume and stock prices within short time periods have posed a great challenge for the convergence of networks result. Informer is a more novel network, improved on Transformer with smaller computational complexity, longer prediction length and global time stamp features. We have designed three experiments to compare Informer with the commonly used networks LSTM, Transformer and BERT on 1-minute and 5-minute frequencies for four different stocks/ market indices. The prediction results are measured by three evaluation criteria: MAE, RMSE and MAPE. Informer has obtained best performance among all the networks on every dataset. translated_title: 使用Informer网络进行股票和市场指数预测
translated_abstract: 深度学习在金融市场预测中的应用已经引起了投资者和研究人员的极大关注。Informer是一种新型的网络，它在Transformer的基础上进行了改进，具有更小的计算复杂度、更长的预测长度和全局时间戳特性。我们设计了三个实验，比较了在1分钟和5分钟频率下使用Informer、LSTM、Transformer和BERT预测四种不同股票/市场指数的效果。预测结果通过三个评估标准进行评估：MAE、RMSE和MAPE。Informer在每个数据集上都获得了最佳表现。
tldr: 本文介绍了一种新型的Informer网络，该网络在股票和市场指数预测中取得了最佳表现。
